comments.content:
Could this be / become another ‘Hellenic Wide’ thread, maybe.?

_May I copy and paste something I posted in a previous thread, on the ‘old’ Typophile.: ‘..If you are looking for a ‘Hellenic Wide’ revival, like ‘58 Rodeo’, you may want to consider some of these.: ‘ [Antique Central](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111225840/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/aboutype/antique-central/)’, ‘ [Hefty](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111225840/http:/www.buyfonts.com/value_for_money/hefty.htm)’, ‘ [HiFi Stereo](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111225840/http:/hem.passagen.se/spsweet/font2/stereo.html)’ ( Free ), ‘ [Platon](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111225840/http:/www.csaimages.com/)’, ‘ [Zapata](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111225840/http:/www.letterror.com/foundry/zapata/index.html)’..’_
